org.texgen.utils
Class TerrainTexture

java.lang.Object
  org.texgen.utils.TerrainTexture

public abstract class TerrainTexture
extends java.lang.Object

Helper class that contains some useful terrain textures and also combines them into a terrain texture to produce a textured terrain based on the textures defined here.

Author:
Andy Gibson
